price: 25. Degenen voor hen verloochenden en dus kwam de bestraffing van alle kanten op hun af zonder dat zij het besefte.
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
